title: conferred on them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser 
(Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science) 
Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister higher education research innovation science) order 2023

title: conferred on them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act
heading: 2. Sarah Bardon, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Sarah Bardon, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Further and Higher Education, Research, 
Innovation and Science, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to the Minister for 
Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science with effect 
from 17 December 2022. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

28 March, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 31st March, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [224] 3
